The article focuses primarily on AfD's nationwide surge and its performance across multiple state elections. For Baden-Württemberg specifically, the key takeaway is that the Greens, who won the 2021 election with 33%, are now polling third at 20%, behind both CDU (29%) and AfD (21%).
